title: Update Module Details
action: I am a manager user on the modules page. I can update the details of a module on the modules page, including the name, year running and cover picture.

title: Reset Password
action: I am a manager/developer user on the login page. Any user can reset their password through the 'Forgot your Password?' button on the login page. After accessing the link, the user is prompted to enter their email, where a new password reset link will be sent. A user can open the link in the sent email to reset their password.
